solution_line_template: Angela slept {january_sleep_hours_per_night} - {december_sleep_hours_per_night} = <<{january_sleep_hours_per_night}-{december_sleep_hours_per_night}={daily_sleep_increase}>>{daily_sleep_increase} more hours each night in January.

There are {days_in_month} days in December and January, so Angela {daily_sleep_increase} x {days_in_month} = <<{days_in_month}*{daily_sleep_increase}={total_sleep_increase}>>{total_sleep_increase} more hours sleep.
